subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes the configuration properties of the DataGrid UI component.

subMembers.name: autoNavigateToFocusedRow
subMembers.description: Automatically scrolls the component to the focused row when the [focusedRowKey] is changed. Incompatible with infinite [scrolling mode].

subMembers.name: columns
subMembers.description: An array of grid columns.

subMembers.name: customizeColumns
subMembers.description: Customizes columns after they are created.

subMembers.name: dataRowComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dataRowTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: dataRowRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [dataRowTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: dataRowTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for data rows.

subMembers.name: allowAdding
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can add new rows.

subMembers.name: allowDeleting
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can delete rows. It is called for each data row when defined as a function.

subMembers.name: allowUpdating
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a user can update rows. It is called for each data row when defined as a function.

subMembers.name: key
subMembers.description: The key of the row being created, updated, or removed.

subMembers.name: editing
subMembers.description: Configures editing.

subMembers.name: newRowPosition
subMembers.description: Specifies a position for a new row.

subMembers.name: allowExportSelectedData
subMembers.description: Allows users to export selected rows only.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Adds the Export button to the DataGrid's toolbar.

subMembers.name: export
subMembers.description: Configures client-side exporting.

subMembers.name: formats
subMembers.description: Specifies the availability and captions of data export buttons.

subMembers.name: exportAll
subMembers.description: The text or hint of the command that exports all data.

subMembers.name: exportSelectedRows
subMembers.description: The text of the command that exports selected rows. Applies when the [allowExportSelectedData] property is **true**.

subMembers.name: exportTo
subMembers.description: The hint of the **Export** button when the [allowExportSelectedData] property is **true**.

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Configures the texts of export commands, buttons, and hints.

subMembers.name: allowColumnDragging
subMembers.description: Specifies whether columns can be dragged onto or from the group panel.

subMembers.name: emptyPanelText
subMembers.description: Specifies text displayed by the group panel when it does not contain any columns.

subMembers.name: groupPanel
subMembers.description: Configures the [group panel].

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the [group panel] is visible or not.

subMembers.name: allowCollapsing
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the user can collapse grouped records in a grid or not.

subMembers.name: autoExpandAll
subMembers.description: Specifies whether groups appear expanded or not.

subMembers.name: contextMenuEnabled
subMembers.description: Enables the user to group data using the context menu.

subMembers.name: expandMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the event on which a group will be expanded/collapsed.

subMembers.name: grouping
subMembers.description: Configures grouping.

subMembers.name: groupByThisColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that groups data by a specific column.

subMembers.name: groupContinuedMessage
subMembers.description: Specifies the message displayed in a group row when the corresponding group is continued from the previous page.

subMembers.name: groupContinuesMessage
subMembers.description: Specifies the message displayed in a group row when the corresponding group continues on the next page.

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Defines the texts of grouping-related visual elements.

subMembers.name: ungroup
subMembers.description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that clears grouping settings of a specific column.

subMembers.name: ungroupAll
subMembers.description: Specifies the text of the context menu item that clears grouping settings of all columns.

subMembers.name: keyExpr
subMembers.description: Specifies the key property (or properties) that provide(s) key values to access data items. Each key value must be unique. This property applies only if data is a [simple array].

subMembers.name: autoExpandAll
subMembers.description: Specifies whether detail sections appear expanded or collapsed.

subMembers.name: component
subMembers.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Enables an end user to expand/collapse detail sections.

subMembers.name: masterDetail
subMembers.description: Allows you to build a [master-detail interface] in the grid.

subMembers.name: render
subMembers.description: An alias for the [template] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: template
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for detail sections.

subMembers.name: filtering
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not [filtering] must be performed on the server side.

subMembers.name: groupPaging
subMembers.description: Specifies whether paging by groups should be performed on the server side.

subMembers.name: grouping
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not [grouping] must be performed on the server side.

subMembers.name: paging
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not [paging] must be performed on the server side.

subMembers.name: remoteOperations
subMembers.description: Notifies the DataGrid of the server's data processing operations.

subMembers.name: sorting
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not [sorting] must be performed on the server side.

subMembers.name: summary
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not [summaries] summaries are calculated on the server-side.

subMembers.name: rowComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [rowTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: rowRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [rowTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: rowTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for rows.

subMembers.name: mode
subMembers.description: Specifies the scrolling mode.

subMembers.name: scrolling
subMembers.description: Configures scrolling.

subMembers.name: selectedRowKeys
subMembers.description: Allows you to select rows or determine which rows are selected. Applies only if **selection**.[deferred] is **false**.

subMembers.name: deferred
subMembers.description: Makes selection deferred.

subMembers.name: selectAllMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the mode in which all the records are selected. Applies only if **selection**.[allowSelectAll] is **true**.

subMembers.name: selection
subMembers.description: Configures runtime selection.

subMembers.name: sensitivity
subMembers.description: Specifies how to filter selected DataGrid rows based on sensitivity.

subMembers.name: showCheckBoxesMode
subMembers.description: Specifies when to display the selection column and row selection checkboxes. Applies only if **selection**.[mode] is *"multiple"*.

subMembers.name: selectionFilter
subMembers.description: Specifies [filters] for the rows that must be selected initially. Applies only if **selection**.[deferred] is **true**.

subMembers.name: groupColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies the identifier of the column that must be used in [grouping] so that sorting by [group summary item values] be applied.

subMembers.name: sortByGroupSummaryInfo
subMembers.description: Allows you to sort [groups] according to the values of group summary items.

subMembers.name: sortOrder
subMembers.description: Specifies the sort order of group summary item values.

subMembers.name: summaryItem
subMembers.description: Specifies the group summary item whose values must be used to sort groups.

subMembers.name: calculateCustomSummary
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom aggregate function. This function is called for summary items whose [summaryType] is *"custom"*.

subMembers.name: alignByColumn
subMembers.description: Indicates whether to display group summary items in parentheses after the group row header or to align them by the corresponding columns within the group row.

subMembers.name: column
subMembers.description: Specifies the column that provides data for a group summary item.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Customizes the text to be displayed in the summary item.

subMembers.name: displayFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies the summary item's text.

subMembers.name: groupItems
subMembers.description: Specifies items of the group summary.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the group summary item's identifier.

subMembers.name: showInColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies the column that must hold the summary item when this item is [displayed in the group footer] or [aligned by a column in the group row].

subMembers.name: showInGroupFooter
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not a summary item must be displayed in the group footer.

subMembers.name: skipEmptyValues
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to skip *empty strings*, **null**, and **undefined** values when calculating a summary. Does not apply when you use a remote data source.

subMembers.name: summaryType
subMembers.description: Specifies how to aggregate data for the group summary item.

subMembers.name: valueFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies a summary item value's display format.

subMembers.name: recalculateWhileEditing
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to recalculate summaries while a user edits data.

subMembers.name: skipEmptyValues
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to skip *empty strings*, **null** and **undefined** values when calculating a summary. Does not apply when you use a remote data source.

subMembers.name: summary
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties of the grid summary.

subMembers.name: avg
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"avg"* summary items when they are displayed in the parent column.

subMembers.name: avgOtherColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"avg"* summary items displayed in a group row or in any other column rather than the parent one.

subMembers.name: count
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"count"* summary items.

subMembers.name: max
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"max"* summary items when they are displayed in the parent column.

subMembers.name: maxOtherColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"max"* summary items displayed in a group row or in any other column rather than the parent one.

subMembers.name: min
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"min"* summary items when they are displayed in the parent column.

subMembers.name: minOtherColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"min"* summary items displayed in a group row or in any other column rather than the parent one.

subMembers.name: sum
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"sum"* summary items when they are displayed in the parent column.

subMembers.name: sumOtherColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"sum"* summary items displayed in a group row or in any other column rather than the parent one.

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Contains properties that specify text patterns for summary items.

subMembers.name: alignment
subMembers.description: Specifies the alignment of a summary item.

subMembers.name: column
subMembers.description: Specifies the column that provides data for a summary item.

subMembers.name: cssClass
subMembers.description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to a summary item.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Customizes the text to be displayed in the summary item.

subMembers.name: displayFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies the summary item's text.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the total summary item's identifier.

subMembers.name: showInColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies the column that must hold the summary item.

subMembers.name: skipEmptyValues
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: summaryType
subMembers.description: Specifies how to aggregate data for the total summary item.

subMembers.name: totalItems
subMembers.description: Specifies items of the total summary.

subMembers.name: valueFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies a summary item value's display format.

subMembers.name: toolbar
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: Row
subMembers.description: A grid row.

subMembers.name: data
subMembers.description: The [data object] represented by the row.

subMembers.name: groupIndex
subMembers.description: The [group index] of the row. Available when the [rowType] is *"group"*.

subMembers.name: isEditing
subMembers.description: Indicates whether the row is in the editing state.

subMembers.name: isExpanded
subMembers.description: Indicates whether the row is expanded or collapsed. Available if [rowType] is *"data"* or *"group"*.

subMembers.name: isNewRow
subMembers.description: Indicates that the row is added, but not yet saved. Available if [rowType] is *"data"*.

subMembers.name: isSelected
subMembers.description: Indicates whether the row is [selected]. Available if [rowType] is *"data"*.

subMembers.name: key
subMembers.description: The key of the data object represented by the row.

subMembers.name: rowIndex
subMembers.description: The *visible* index of the row.

subMembers.name: rowType
subMembers.description: The row's type.

subMembers.name: values
subMembers.description: Values of the row as they exist in the data source.

properties.name: dxDataGrid
properties.description: The DataGrid is a UI component that represents data from a local or remote source in the form of a grid. This UI component offers such basic features as [sorting], [grouping], [filtering], as well as more advanced capabilities, like [state storing], [client-side exporting], [master-detail interface], and many others.

Methods.name: addRow()
Methods.description: Adds an empty data row and switches it to the editing state.

Methods.name: collapseAll(groupIndex)
Methods.description: Collapses master rows or groups of a specific level.

Methods.name: collapseRow(key)
Methods.description: Collapses a group or a master row with a specific key.

Methods.name: expandAll(groupIndex)
Methods.description: Expands master rows or groups of a specific level. Does not apply if data is remote.

Methods.name: expandRow(key)
Methods.description: Expands a group or a master row with a specific key.

Methods.name: getSelectedRowKeys()
Methods.description: Gets the currently selected rows' keys.

Methods.name: getSelectedRowsData()
Methods.description: Gets the selected rows' data objects.

Methods.name: getTotalSummaryValue(summaryItemName)
Methods.description: Gets the value of a [total summary item].

Methods.name: getVisibleColumns(headerLevel)
Methods.description: Gets all visible columns at a specific hierarchical level of column headers. Use it to access [banded columns].

Methods.name: isRowExpanded(key)
Methods.description: Checks whether a specific group or master row is expanded or collapsed.

Methods.name: isRowSelected(data)
Methods.description: Checks whether a row found using its data object is selected. Takes effect only if **selection**.[deferred] is **true**.

Methods.name: isRowSelected(key)
Methods.description: Checks whether a row with a specific key is selected. Takes effect only if **selection**.[deferred] is **false**.

Events.name: onAdaptiveDetailRowPreparing
Events.description: A function that is executed before an adaptive detail row is rendered.

Events.name: onCellClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a cell is clicked or tapped. Executed before [onRowClick].

Events.name: onCellDblClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a cell is double-clicked or double-tapped. Executed before [onRowDblClick].

Events.name: onCellHoverChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a cell.

Events.name: onCellPrepared
Events.description: A function that is executed after a grid cell is created.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onContextMenuPreparing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the context menu is rendered.

Events.name: onDataErrorOccurred
Events.description: A function that is executed when an error occurs in the data source.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onEditCanceled
Events.description: A function that is executed after row changes are discarded.

Events.name: onEditCanceling
Events.description: A function that is executed when the edit operation is canceled, but row changes are not yet discarded.

Events.name: onEditingStart
Events.description: A function that is executed before a cell or row switches to the editing state.

Events.name: onEditorPrepared
Events.description: A function that is executed after an editor is created. Not executed for cells with an [editCellTemplate].

Events.name: onEditorPreparing
Events.description: A function used to customize cell [editors]. Not executed for cells with an [editCellTemplate].

Events.name: onExporting
Events.description: A function that is executed before data is exported.

Events.name: onFocusedCellChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the focused cell changes. Applies only to cells in data or group rows.

Events.name: onFocusedCellChanging
Events.description: A function that is executed before the focused cell changes. Applies only to cells in data or group rows.

Events.name: onFocusedRowChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the focused row changes. Applies only to data or group rows. [focusedRowEnabled] should be **true**.

Events.name: onFocusedRowChanging
Events.description: A function that is executed before the focused row changes. Applies only to data or group rows. [focusedRowEnabled] should be **true**.

Events.name: onInitNewRow
Events.description: A function that is executed before a new row is added to the UI component.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onKeyDown
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is in focus and a key has been pressed down.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onRowClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a row is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onRowCollapsed
Events.description: A function that is executed after a row is collapsed.

Events.name: onRowCollapsing
Events.description: A function that is executed before a row is collapsed.

Events.name: onRowDblClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a row is double-clicked or double-tapped. Executed after [onCellDblClick].

Events.name: onRowExpanded
Events.description: A function that is executed after a row is expanded.

Events.name: onRowExpanding
Events.description: A function that is executed before a row is expanded.

Events.name: onRowInserted
Events.description: A function that is executed after a new row has been inserted into the data source.

Events.name: onRowInserting
Events.description: A function that is executed before a new row is inserted into the data source.

Events.name: onRowPrepared
Events.description: A function that is executed after a row is created.

Events.name: onRowRemoved
Events.description: A function that is executed after a row has been removed from the data source.

Events.name: onRowRemoving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a row is removed from the data source.

Events.name: onRowUpdated
Events.description: A function that is executed after a row has been updated in the data source.

Events.name: onRowUpdating
Events.description: A function that is executed before a row is updated in the data source.

Events.name: onRowValidating
Events.description: A function that is executed after cells in a row are validated against [validation rules].

Events.name: onSaved
Events.description: A function that is executed after row changes are saved.

Events.name: onSaving
Events.description: A function that is executed before pending row changes are saved.

Events.name: onSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after selecting a row or clearing its selection.

Events.name: onToolbarPreparing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the toolbar is created.

Events.name: cellClick
Events.description: Raised when a cell is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: cellDblClick
Events.description: Raised when a cell is double-clicked or double-tapped.

Events.name: cellHoverChanged
Events.description: Raised after the pointer enters or leaves a cell.

Events.name: cellPrepared
Events.description: Raised after a cell is created.

Events.name: contextMenuPreparing
Events.description: Raised before the context menu is rendered.

Events.name: editingStart
Events.description: Raised before a cell or row switches to the editing state.

Events.name: editorPrepared
Events.description: Raised after an editor is created.

Events.name: editorPreparing
Events.description: Raised before an editor is created.

Events.name: exporting
Events.description: Raised before data is exported.

Events.name: focusedCellChanged
Events.description: Raised after the focused cell changes.

Events.name: focusedCellChanging
Events.description: Raised before the focused cell changes.

Events.name: focusedRowChanged
Events.description: Raised after the focused row changes. Applies only when [focusedRowEnabled] is **true**.

Events.name: focusedRowChanging
Events.description: Raised before the focused row changes. Applies only when [focusedRowEnabled] is **true**.

Events.name: rowClick
Events.description: Raised when a row is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: rowDblClick
Events.description: Raised when a row is double-clicked or double-tapped.

Events.name: rowPrepared
Events.description: Raised after a row is created.

Types.name: AdaptiveDetailRowPreparingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [adaptiveDetailRowPreparing] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: CellClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [cellClick] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: CellDblClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [cellDblClick] event handler's argument.

subMembers.description: The type of the [cellHoverChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: CellPreparedEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [cellPrepared] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: ContextMenuPreparingEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [contextMenuPreparing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DataErrorOccurredEvent
Types.description: The type of the [dataErrorOccurred] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DataGridCommandColumnType
Types.description: Specifies the [command column] that this object customizes.

Types.name: DataGridExportFormat
Types.description: Specifies the availability and captions of data export buttons.

Types.name: DataGridPredefinedColumnButton
Types.description: The name used to identify a built-in button.

Types.name: DataGridPredefinedToolbarItem
Types.description: A name used to identify the toolbar item.

Types.name: DataGridScrollMode
Types.description: Specifies the scrolling mode.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: EditCanceledEvent
Types.description: The type of the [editCanceled] event handler's argument.

Types.name: EditCancelingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [editCanceling] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: texts

subMembers.name: ExportTexts

Types.name: GroupData
Types.description: Specifies a group of elements in a template.

subMembers.description: Configures the [group panel].

subMembers.description: Specifies whether columns can be dragged onto or from the group panel.

subMembers.name: emptyPanelText
subMembers.default: 'Drag a column header here to group by that column'

subMembers.description: Specifies whether the [group panel] is visible or not.

subMembers.name: Scrolling
subMembers.description: Configures scrolling.

subMembers.name: mode
subMembers.description: Specifies the scrolling mode.

Types.name: SelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [selectionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SelectionSensitivity
Types.description: Specifies sensitivity modes.

subMembers.name: SortByGroupSummaryInfoItem
subMembers.description: Allows you to sort [groups] according to the values of group summary items.

subMembers.name: groupColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies the identifier of the column that must be used in [grouping] so that sorting by [group summary item values] be applied.

subMembers.name: sortOrder
subMembers.description: Specifies the sort order of group summary item values.

subMembers.name: summaryItem
subMembers.description: Specifies the group summary item whose values must be used to sort groups.

subMembers.name: Summary
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties of the grid summary.

subMembers.name: calculateCustomSummary
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom aggregate function. This function is called for summary items whose [summaryType] is *"custom"*.

subMembers.name: groupItems
subMembers.description: Specifies items of the group summary.

subMembers.name: recalculateWhileEditing
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to recalculate summaries while a user edits data.

subMembers.name: skipEmptyValues
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to skip *empty strings*, **null** and **undefined** values when calculating a summary. Does not apply when you use a remote data source.

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Contains properties that specify text patterns for summary items.

subMembers.name: totalItems
subMembers.description: Specifies items of the total summary.

subMembers.name: SummaryGroupItem
subMembers.description: Specifies items of the group summary.

subMembers.name: alignByColumn
subMembers.description: Indicates whether to display group summary items in parentheses after the group row header or to align them by the corresponding columns within the group row.

subMembers.name: column
subMembers.description: Specifies the column that provides data for a group summary item.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Customizes the text to be displayed in the summary item.

subMembers.name: displayFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies the summary item's text.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the group summary item's identifier.

subMembers.name: showInColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies the column that must hold the summary item when this item is [displayed in the group footer] or [aligned by a column in the group row].

subMembers.name: showInGroupFooter
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not a summary item must be displayed in the group footer.

subMembers.name: skipEmptyValues
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to skip *empty strings*, **null**, and **undefined** values when calculating a summary. Does not apply when you use a remote data source.

subMembers.name: summaryType
subMembers.description: Specifies how to aggregate data for the group summary item.

subMembers.name: valueFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies a summary item value's display format.

subMembers.name: SummaryTexts
subMembers.description: Contains properties that specify text patterns for summary items.

subMembers.name: avg
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"avg"* summary items when they are displayed in the parent column.

subMembers.name: avgOtherColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"avg"* summary items displayed in a group row or in any other column rather than the parent one.

subMembers.name: count
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"count"* summary items.

subMembers.name: max
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"max"* summary items when they are displayed in the parent column.

subMembers.name: maxOtherColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"max"* summary items displayed in a group row or in any other column rather than the parent one.

subMembers.name: min
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"min"* summary items when they are displayed in the parent column.

subMembers.name: minOtherColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"min"* summary items displayed in a group row or in any other column rather than the parent one.

subMembers.name: sum
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"sum"* summary items when they are displayed in the parent column.

subMembers.name: sumOtherColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies a pattern for the *"sum"* summary items displayed in a group row or in any other column rather than the parent one.

subMembers.name: SummaryTotalItem
subMembers.description: Specifies items of the total summary.

subMembers.name: alignment
subMembers.description: Specifies the alignment of a summary item.

subMembers.name: column
subMembers.description: Specifies the column that provides data for a summary item.

subMembers.name: cssClass
subMembers.description: Specifies a CSS class to be applied to a summary item.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Customizes the text to be displayed in the summary item.

subMembers.name: displayFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies the summary item's text.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the total summary item's identifier.

subMembers.name: showInColumn
subMembers.description: Specifies the column that must hold the summary item.

subMembers.name: skipEmptyValues
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: summaryType
subMembers.description: Specifies how to aggregate data for the total summary item.

subMembers.name: valueFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies a summary item value's display format.

Types.name: ToolbarPreparingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [toolbarPreparing] event handler's argument.
